snippet: Two other sheriff’s deputies were wounded in the violence in a town near New Orleans, and five people were taken into custody.
abstract: Two sheriff's deputies are shot and killed and two others are wounded in ambushes at a parking lot and a trailer park in LaPlace, La; five people are taken into custody.
lead_paragraph: Two other sheriff’s deputies were wounded in the violence in a town near New Orleans, and five people were taken into custody.

headline.seo: Two Deputies Killed in Louisiana Shootings
headline.main: Two Deputies Are Shot and Killed in a Louisiana Ambush
headline.print_headline: Two Deputies Are Shot and Killed in a Louisiana Ambush
